Julie Laskaris, is an Associate Professor, in the Department of Classical Studies, University of Richmond (Virginia, USA). She received her doctorate from the University of California, Los Angeles, 1999. Her research interests centre on ancient medicine and pharmacology. Her publications include “The Eros of Achilles: Homoerotic Bonding Among Combat Soldiers
The Art is Long: On the Sacred Disease and the Scientific Ancient Warfare
